content: today i d like to share with you this video for crocheting little polar bear of furry yarn i like these textured amigurumi they feel different to the touch and they are simply incredible to hold and handle difficulty level medium this pattern requires experience in crocheting of furry yarn materials and tools 1 yarn recommended alize softy 100% mikropolyester 115m*50g 128yds*1 76oz in colors white #55 col a 1ball beige #310 col b small amount 2 stuffing 3 one pair of safety eyes 10mm 4 safety nose 12mm 5 hook size 2mm us 4 6 yarn for embroidery in black and brown colors 7 needle for sewing scissors pins markers tapestry needle 8 plastic joints d=10-15mm 4 pins for legs attaching d=35-40mm 1pin for head attaching
